VenueManager.description: Oversees venue sourcing, layout planning, capacity validation, and booking management across multiple providers.
VenueManager.expert_prompt: You are the Venue Manager Agent. You specialize in cross-provider venue discovery, booking coordination, and conflict resolution. Use relevant APIs to compare availability, capacity, and pricing before confirming final decisions.

VenueFinderAPI.description: Primary API for searching venues across regions. Supports basic filters and returns summarized metadata.

BookSpaceAPI.description: Provides real-time slot-level availability for listed venues.

HallIQ.description: Fetch layout-based capacity and seating recommendations for a venue.

VenueQuoteAPI.description: Returns estimated rental pricing and surcharges for given usage parameters.

VenueLockAPI.description: Temporarily reserves a venue slot before full confirmation to avoid double bookings.

VenueCancelAPI.description: Used to cancel pre-confirmed or held venue bookings.

CateringManager.description: Coordinates catering vendors, menu designs, pricing negotiations, and dietary validations across multiple partners.
CateringManager.expert_prompt: You are the Catering Manager Agent. You are responsible for ensuring food, beverages, and dietary arrangements are compliant with event needs. Always compare vendors and validate menus before confirming.

MenuCraftAPI.description: Returns available menu packages and cost breakdowns per guest.

FoodEdge.description: Lists available catering vendors filtered by city and service style.

PlatefulAPI.description: Generates dynamic pricing and order quotes for a vendor-menu pair.

DietScanAPI.description: Analyzes a menu against allergy and dietary restriction lists.

ChefConnect.description: Checks chef or vendor staff availability on a given date.

TasteLink.description: Used to request sample tasting deliveries before finalizing menu selection.

LogisticsManager.description: Handles end-to-end event logistics: routing, fleet coordination, staff scheduling, delivery tracking, inventory allocation, vendor management, and compliance.
LogisticsManager.expert_prompt: You are the Logistics Manager Agent. You coordinate transport, staff, inventory, and partner operations. Use the relevant APIs to plan, monitor, and resolve issues dynamically.

MoveSync.description: Fetches optimized routes with live traffic and toll cost data.

TransitIQ.description: Estimates delivery or transport arrival times using live GPS telemetry.

FleetDeskAPI.description: Checks vehicle availability and maintenance status by type and date.

TrackFleet.description: Monitors fuel level, mileage, and maintenance alerts for a specific vehicle.

OpsSync.description: Retrieves event-day staff rosters and assigned shift windows.

ShiftIQ.description: Tracks staff check-ins and absences in real time.

LoadIQ.description: Fetches delivery tracking details and fulfillment status.

DropTrack.description: Confirms pickup or drop completion for deliveries with digital proof.

StockPort.description: Retrieves live stock availability of event supplies and equipment.

Storewise.description: Tracks inbound/outbound movements for consumables or gear.

PartnerBridge.description: Lists approved logistics or technical vendors available for collaboration.

LogiHub.description: Fetches existing vendor contract data and expiry details.

CityFlow.description: Provides congestion levels and delay estimates by area code.

SenseFleet.description: Detects route deviations or idle-time anomalies from live vehicle data.

DocFlow.description: Validates required transport permits or event logistics paperwork.

PermitCheck.description: Verifies transport insurance coverage and policy validity.
